EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.10-20-17 IAndrews
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Updates on SpringOne Platform
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team,
Thank you all again for attending Tuesday's Town Hall, and special thanks to the folks from the Pivotal Boeing team for a great panel discussion. If you couldnâ€™t make it, watch the replay on Inside Pivotal <[[https://sites.google.com/a/pivotal.io/inside-pivotal/pivotal-town-hall]]> (where you can also catch a special video message to Pivotal from the Boeing CIO). Your feedback on these events matter, so please take a few minutes to take the Town Hall survey <[[https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScY43L5_4Yh-nf8BCxRqPDOmM6HF1ykxvpFPD3Qy4e5kPsXLw/viewform?usp=sf_link]]>.
Bill
